title: Past Events
description: Here are some of the events we have hosted in the past.

events.title: Professor Spotlight & Intro to Python Workshop @ B2560
events.description: Hear from tenured Ross Professor and 2021 Ross Researcher of the Year, Brian Wu. Stick around for a 30-minute workshop covering Python essentials!

events.title: Professor Spotlight @ R1210
events.description: Hear from the Ross Chair of Accounting, Chris Williams, about his experience with research and opportunities for undergraduates to get involved in research.

events.title: Mass Meeting & Faculty Panel @ R1210
events.description: Learn about M-HUB, meet the members, and learn from and network with a trio of Ross Strategy professors and researchers.

events.title: M-Hub Research Symposium @ Blau Colloquium
events.description: Hear from a panel of distinguished professors with years of academic and industry experience and get involved with research projects!
